sentences.english: I think that's because Baggio is our favorite star.
sentences.chinese: 我想那是因为巴乔是我们俩最喜欢的球星的缘故吧。

sentences.english: Virtus Bologna has made numerous contract offers to the Los Angeles Lakers star.
sentences.chinese: 博洛尼亚为湖人队的很多球星提供了少量的合同。

sentences.english: The Newcastle United star's wife, Louise Bonsall, gave birth to a girl on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 这位纽卡球星的妻子路易斯星期一给他生了一个女儿。

sentences.english: Source: Goal. com"Olympiacos announce the acquisition of Liverpool's Spanish international Albert Riera."
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹亚科斯宣布签下利物浦的西班牙球星里埃拉。

sentences.english: Italian football clubs are queuing up to sign the young star.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的足球俱乐部都抢着要与这个年轻球星签约。

sentences.english: The former Manchester United player's contract with Los Angeles Galaxy runs out at the end of December.
sentences.chinese: 前曼联球星与洛杉矶银河队的合同12底就将到期。

sentences.english: All the legends have been great - they've all been brilliant with me.
sentences.chinese: 每个传奇球星都是伟大的，他们让我蓬荜生辉。

sentences.english: The star half-back jetted toward the goal line .
sentences.chinese: 那个球星中锋冲向球门线。

sentences.english: We had to rake through a throng of ball fans waiting to see the star.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须从等着看球星的大群球迷中挤过去。

sentences.english: Why is the 34-year-old soccer phenom one of the sexiest men alive?
sentences.chinese: 为何这位34岁的球星成为最性感的男人之一。

sentences.english: New stars have joined the club, but the group became well-oiled.
sentences.chinese: 新的球星融入了球队，但是球队之间的磨合很好。

sentences.english: I could get the autographs of the stars easily.
sentences.chinese: 我总能很容易的得到球星签名。
球星们打球打得非常好。

sentences.english: The bellboy had decided his western name should be that of his favourite footballer.
sentences.chinese: 那位服务员决定取自己最喜爱的球星作为自己的洋名。

sentences.english: Believe it or not, I met a super football star this morning on the street.
sentences.chinese: 信不信由你，我今天早晨在街上遇到一个超级球星。

sentences.english: Roma management are discussing a move for Cagliari star David Suazo.
sentences.chinese: 罗马的管理层增在讨论要引进卡利亚里的球星苏亚佐。

definition: (astronomy) giant star/(fig.) superstar (of opera, basketball etc)
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
